lead_paragraph: Jack Nicklaus called the embrace with his oldest son Jackie, after his magical ride through the pines at Augusta National 30 years ago, perhaps the most memorable moment of his legendary career.

headline.print_headline: Memories of the 1986 Masters Never Gets Old for Nicklaus
headline.main: Memories of the 1986 Masters Never Gets Old for Nicklaus
